title: Non-client features
body:
Dear Rito,

I'm writing to express a thought that has plagued me ever since I started playing League. I would like to know why a number of client features are not available on the League of Legends website, features such as the store, runes, masteries, collections etc.

I would suggest these features could be made accessible out-of-client, allowing players who are mobile or using another computer to engage in the pre-game of League of Legends, spend our RP and IP, and be ready to go when we hit the rift. The fullest extent of this would be to develop a League of Legends app which makes these features available on a mobile client, although I understand this last part would require more significant development.

An answer on this and the possibility of it happening in the future would be much appreciated.

Regards,
Lloydhavemercy
